title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-19] [$250] Expense - Receipt thumbnail shows a green receipt placeholder while it is uploading
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to FAB > Submit expense > Manual.
3. Submit a manual expense with receipt to any user.
4. After submitting the expense, check the receipt thumbnail while it is uploading.

Expected result: The receipt thumbnail will show the receipt while it is uploading (production behavior).

Actual result: None
html_description:

Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to FAB > Submit expense > Manual. 3. Submit a manual expense with receipt to any user. 4. After submitting the expense, check the receipt thumbnail while it is uploading. ## Expected Result: The receipt thumbnail will show the receipt while it is uploading (production behavior). ## Actual Result: The receipt thumbnail shows a green receipt placeholder while it is uploading. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [x] Android: Native - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: Native - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5762545c-c2c3-4830-b121-854f29c9fa6b [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
